page.title: 05Reverend Kelly's day
page.content: A typical day begins at 6.30.I get up, have breakfast and leave for St. Bartholomew's Church at 7.30. The first service of the day begins at 8.00and ends at 8.45. After talking to some of the parishoners,I make my way to St.Chad's Church in Irby village, where I take a sevice at 9.45. Then it's back to the parish church for a family service at 11.30. Following this ,my wife,my son and I make our way home and have our Sunday lunch together. In the afternoon, there are infant baptisms in St.Bartholomew's Church and an evening service from 6.30 until 7.45.
